name: Off the Tracks (itch)
description:
A cooperative gameplay experience where you control a handcar through pumping and learning. Inspired by Mario Party's Handcar Havoc minigame and Donkey Kong 64's mine cart mode. Pickup collectible gems, avoid enemy attacks and get to the goal as quickly as you can!

*Was originally designed to be played with an alternative controller. 

Controls:

Keyboard:
- Pump: Alternate W and E
- Lean left: Left Arrow or 1
- Lean right: Right Arrow or 3

Controller:

- Pump: Alternate Left and Right Triggers
- Lean: Right Control Stick
